page.title: 20PORTUGAL STREET ASHTON
page.content: {Portugal St.}is split into two by the main Ashton to Stockport Rd.There are 20 houses in total. { Hugh Mason}purchased the land for his employees.The houses are mainly terraced and were built in the 1850's. There is a newsagents shop at the corner,no.54.Opposite no.54 is an engineering works called Castle and Fielding. {Mrs.Noden}lives on her own at no.34.She is not satisfied with the dirt and she thinks that the council should improve the pavements and drains.She does not like the cheeky children running up and down the pavement at 11.00pm every night. She works at Ryecroft Engineering.In her spare time she knits.She moved here 39 years ago when she got married.
